titleStmt.title: Remarks upon the present confederacy, and late revolution in England, &c.
titleStmt.author: Anderton, William, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Has been attributed to William Anderton, who was tried and executed for printing this and other seditious pamphlets. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
